content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. May I have your name, please?
Hi, my name is George Thompson.
Thanks, George! Can you please provide the address where the HVAC service is needed?
Got it. Let me just confirm that your address is within our service area.
Your address is within our service area. When would be an ideal time for our technician to come by?
I am only free during weekday evenings after 7 PM or very early in the morning before 6 AM.
Thank you for that information. I will check our calendar now to find availability for those times.
Unfortunately, we donâ€™t have available slots after 7 PM or before 6 AM in the coming days. The earliest available times are between 9 AM and 5 PM on weekdays. Does any of those work for you?
No, those times won't fit my schedule at all. I guess I'll have to look elsewhere. Thanks anyway.
reason: Customer declined due to no suitable time slots
